content.rendered:
Custom VIP 2020 Winter Classic Packages

For hockey fans, there’s no better way to kick off the new year! Roadtrips’ 2020 Winter Classic packages are fully customizable with first class accommodations in Dallas, your preferred tickets in the Cotton Bowl, and plenty of other extras to complement your experience. Join us in Texas to watch hockey the way it was meant to be played: outdoors! Complete 2020 Winter Classic packages available from $835 per person, based on double occupancy.

About the 2020 Winter Classic

One of the most popular hockey games of the season is headed to Dallas, Texas and you can be sure they know how to put on a big event. The iconic Cotton Bowl Stadium will provide the backdrop to this fun annual game. Held every year since 2008, the upcoming NHL Winter Classic will take place on January 1, 2020 and will feature the Dallas Stars and one of their division rivals, the Nashville Predators. The two teams will battle not only each other but also the elements, in a true test of talent and grit.
